1.title: Selection

11.content: Which lovely swimsuit variant finds herself on the menu?
11.title: Summer Cuisine

12.content: Who is on the menu?
12.title: Sabers

121.content:
Okita Souji as she appears in this story: https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/fate...

You chosen the lovely (and tasty) Okita Souji to be the main course but where will she be?
121.title: Sakura Saber, but Where?

1214.content:
"Where are my haori and sword?!" Okita cried out in panic. She was fine with losing the scarf but she had just found her haori and now it was missing again, and how was she supposed to serve her beloved master with out her sword. Speaking of her master why hadn't they said anything.

         Okita looked around and finally realized that she at least had not been ray shifted to the right place. Okita's location was full of trees, water, and the ground beneath her relatively bare feet was muddy. Then there was the smell. It was rank.

         "What am I doing in a swamp?" The sakura saber pondered. She didn't have the means of contacting Chaldea to find out what went wrong. Not with out her master anyways. However, if Okita had ended up in this swamp then maybe her master did do. She just had to find them. But where to start?

         To Okita's left was path covered in vines and vegetation, but without her sword maneuvering would be difficult. The path on her right was clear, but it appeared to be a game trail and a quick cough was enough to remind Okita that she was frailer than other servants. The sakura saber could forward wading through the water, but who knew what was lurking in there. Another option Okita could climb up a tree and try to get the lay of the land; the only problem was that she was not an archer. Okita was deciding what to do when she...
1214.title: A Sakura in a Swamp

12145.content: A sound came from behind Okita. She quickly turned around and her eyes widened at the sight of...
12145.title: Hears something behind her

151.content: Which lovely archer is on the menu?
151.title: Which Archer?

info.brief_description: One of the lovely female servants of Fate/Grand Order ends up on the menu
info.description:
During a ray shift accident one of the female servants of Fate/Grand Order ends up in a special singularity. In this singularity the femal servants are at the bottom of the food chain and everything wants to eat them. Will they make it back to their master or will they become food?

Rules:
1.) Scathach is the only female servant capable of being immune to digestion.
2.) Only one female servant per story line.
3.) The story only ends when he female servant we're following is eaten and digested.
4.) Female servants must eventually be eaten.
5.) Soft and cock vore only.
6.) Swimsuit servants will always wind up on a tropical island.
7.) Have Fun.
